Structs/FileTargetConfig.html#/s:4Logr16.name: maxArchivedFilesCount
Structs/FileTargetConfig.html#/s:4Logr16.abstract: Maximum number of archived files to keep. Defaults to 1.

Structs/FileTargetConfig.html#/s:4Logr16.name: archiveFrequency
Structs/FileTargetConfig.html#/s:4Logr16.abstract: Determines minimum time until log file should be archived.

Structs/FileTargetConfig.html#/s:4Logr16.name: maxFileSizeInBytes
Structs/FileTargetConfig.html#/s:4Logr16.abstract: Determines minimum file size until log file should be archived.

Structs/FileTargetConfig.html#/s:4Logr16.name: style
Structs/FileTargetConfig.html#/s:4Logr16.abstract: Determines logging style used by the target.

Structs/FileTargetConfig.html#/s:4Logr16.name: dateTimeFormat
Structs/FileTargetConfig.html#/s:4Logr16.abstract: Format to be used for log line timestamps

Structs/FileTargetConfig.html#/s:4Logr16.name: header
Structs/FileTargetConfig.html#/s:4Logr16.abstract: Optional header to be addead as the first content to newly create log file

Structs/ConsoleTargetConfig.html#/s:4Log.name: subsystem
Structs/ConsoleTargetConfig.html#/s:4Log.abstract: Subsystem name value assigned during initialization. Used for OSLog configuration.

Structs/ConsoleTargetConfig.html#/s:4Log.name: category
Structs/ConsoleTargetConfig.html#/s:4Log.abstract: Category name value assigned during initialization. Used for OSLog configuration.

Structs/MetaInfo.html#/s:4Logr8MetaInfoV.name: file
Structs/MetaInfo.html#/s:4Logr8MetaInfoV.abstract: Name of the file where log call happened.

Structs/MetaInfo.html#/s:4Logr8MetaInfoV.name: function
Structs/MetaInfo.html#/s:4Logr8MetaInfoV.abstract: Name of the function where log call happened.

Structs/MetaInfo.html#/s:4Logr8MetaInfoV.name: text
Structs/MetaInfo.html#/s:4Logr8MetaInfoV.abstract: Property for transforming MetaInfo struct into text line.

Structs/Config.html#/s:4Logr6ConfigV5asy.name: init(async:dispatchQueue:targets:)
Structs/Config.html#/s:4Logr6ConfigV5asy.abstract: Initializes new immutable config struct with provided values.

Structs/Config.html#/s:4Logr6ConfigV5asy.name: init(async:dispatchQueue:_:)
Structs/Config.html#/s:4Logr6ConfigV5asy.abstract: Initializes new immutable config struct with provided values.

Structs/Config.html.name: Config
Structs/Config.html.abstract: Struct used to enapsulate configuration values, i.e. LogrService.

Structs/Message.html.name: Message
Structs/Message.html.abstract: Immutable struct encapsulating all log message data.

Structs/MetaInfo.html.name: MetaInfo
Structs/MetaInfo.html.abstract: Immutable struct for encapsulating meta information of the log message.

Structs/ConsoleTargetConfig.html.name: ConsoleTargetConfig
Structs/ConsoleTargetConfig.html.abstract: Immutable struct used to encapsulate consolet target configuration values.

Protocols/Target.html#/s:4Logr6TargetP4s.name: send(_:)
Protocols/Target.html#/s:4Logr6TargetP4s.abstract: Function called by LogrService on each received log message.

Protocols/Target.html.name: Target
Protocols/Target.html.abstract: Protocol required by LogrService to dispatch messages.

Enums/Style.html#/s:4Logr5StyleO7minimal.name: minimal
Enums/Style.html#/s:4Logr5StyleO7minimal.abstract: Minimal style denotes short logging style, where only message and level are logged.

Enums/Style.html#/s:4Logr5StyleO7verbose.name: verbose
Enums/Style.html#/s:4Logr5StyleO7verbose.abstract: Verbose style denotes excessive logging style, including, but not limited to message, log level and meta information.

Enums/LogLevel.html.name: LogLevel
Enums/LogLevel.html.abstract: Enum containing available distinct log levels within library.

Enums/TimeSpan.html.name: TimeSpan
Enums/TimeSpan.html.abstract: Enum containing distinct time span values used within library.

Classes/FileTarget.html#/s:4Logr10FileTa.name: fileHandle
Classes/FileTarget.html#/s:4Logr10FileTa.abstract: File handle of a current log file being written to.

Classes/FileTarget.html#/s:4Logr10FileTa.name: init(_:)
Classes/FileTarget.html#/s:4Logr10FileTa.abstract: Initializes FileTarget instance with provided FileTargetConfig struct. Prepares file for receiving and persisting log messages.

Classes/FileTarget.html#/s:4Logr10FileTa.name: archive(_:)
Classes/FileTarget.html#/s:4Logr10FileTa.abstract: Forces archive process of the current log file regardless of the preconditions set in config files. Non-blocking. Thread-safe.

Classes/ConsoleTarget.html#/s:4Logr13Con.name: init(_:)
Classes/ConsoleTarget.html#/s:4Logr13Con.abstract: Initializes ConsoleTarget instance with provided ConsoleTargetConfig struct.

Classes/LogrService.html#/s:4Logr0A7Serv.name: init(with:)
Classes/LogrService.html#/s:4Logr0A7Serv.abstract: Initializes new intance of LogrSerice with provided configuration. Overrides any properties initialized with previous LogrService instance.

Classes/LogrService.html#/s:4Logr0A7Serv.name: log(_:)
Classes/LogrService.html#/s:4Logr0A7Serv.abstract: Dispatches log messages to the targets based on configuration: synchronously or asynchronously.

Classes/Logr.html#/s:4LogrAAC7serviceAA0.name: service
Classes/Logr.html#/s:4LogrAAC7serviceAA0.abstract: LogrServiice instance assigned during initialization. Defaults to main LogrService instance.

Classes/Logr.html#/s:4LogrAAC3tagSSvp.name: tag
Classes/Logr.html#/s:4LogrAAC3tagSSvp.abstract: Tag assinged during initialization. Used as a prefix for all log messages. Helps to categorize/group messages.

Classes/Logr.html#/s:4LogrAAC5debug___4l.name: debug(_:_:_:line:)
Classes/Logr.html#/s:4LogrAAC5debug___4l.abstract: Logs debug type of message to the service.

Classes/Logr.html#/s:4LogrAAC4info___4li.name: info(_:_:_:line:)
Classes/Logr.html#/s:4LogrAAC4info___4li.abstract: Logs info type of message to the service.

Classes/Logr.html#/s:4LogrAAC4warn___4li.name: warn(_:_:_:line:)
Classes/Logr.html#/s:4LogrAAC4warn___4li.abstract: Logs warn type of message to the service.

Classes/Logr.html#/s:4LogrAAC5error___4l.name: error(_:_:_:line:)
Classes/Logr.html#/s:4LogrAAC5error___4l.abstract: Logs error type of message to the service.

Classes/Logr.html#/s:4LogrAAC8critical__.name: critical(_:_:_:line:)
Classes/Logr.html#/s:4LogrAAC8critical__.abstract: Logs critical type of message to the service.

Classes/Logr.html.name: Logr
Classes/Logr.html.abstract: Proxy class used to pass log messages to underlying service.

Classes/LogrService.html.name: LogrService
Classes/LogrService.html.abstract: Main logging service used for dispatching messages to dedicated targets for further processing.

Classes/ConsoleTarget.html.name: ConsoleTarget
Classes/ConsoleTarget.html.abstract: Target class used for logging to unified logging system: i.e. console/Apple Log system facility.

Classes/FileTarget.html.name: FileTarget
Classes/FileTarget.html.abstract: Target class for logging to a file.
